name: Metroidvania Month 16
description:
I started on this gamejam with only 11 hours and 40 minutes left. Hoping I can complete more in the late entry. I have things to do 2 hours before deadline ends and I need some sleep.

Controls: 

Mouse : UI

W A D S : movement

Spacebar : jump

E : Doors

Left shift: Ladders and Climbing

Assets Used: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/hero-nad-opponents-animation-140776
